EmailTemplate.name: 10K Delivery Partner Paid Invoice Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: 10K Payment Has Been Processed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Invoice__c.Billing_Contact_First_Name__c},
A {!Invoice__c.Total_Invoice_Amount__c} payment for {!Invoice__c.Name}, for the period {!Invoice__c.Billing_Period_Start_Date__c} through {!Invoice__c.Billing_Period_End_Date__c}, has been processed and should be reflected in your account in the next few days.
Cheers, 10K Accounts Receivable Team 10K Advisors
